issues.description: The constructor in the solution repository has parameters in a different order than specified in the UML diagram of the problem statement, which could confuse students about the required parameter sequence and lead them to implement an incorrect design.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the constructor in the solution repository to match the order specified in the UML diagram: public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors)
